home_description: Designed and produced by the World Wide Web Foundation, the Web Index is the world’s first measure of the World Wide Web’s contribution to social, economic and political progress in countries across the world.
home_follow_us_description: Be the first to hear about all of our latest news, developments and events.
contact_for_general_info: For general information, email us at:
contact_for_media_requests: For media requests, email us at:
contact_form_comment_type_visualisation: Visualisation and Presentation of the Index
report_title: The Web and Rising Global Inequality
data_description: Here is all the data. Jump right in, explore it and find out how your country stacks up.
error_title: Where we're going we don't need roads
error_subtitle: The page you are searching doesn't exist
error_description: Please, visit our legacy page for previous years' information.
data_country_help: Select a country or a whole region. You can select up to 5 countries to compare.
data_charts_help: Countries are compared with higher and lower countries for the same region.
home_tab_1_caption_1: do not have effective laws and practices to
home_tab_1_caption_2: protect the privacy of online communications.
home_tab_2_caption_1: are not doing enough to stop online
home_tab_3_caption_1: have taken real steps towards improving
home_tab_3_caption_2: education outcomes for poor and marginalised communities.
home_tab_4_caption_2: in a way that is fair and transparent.
home_illustration_2_text: are not doing enough to stop online violence against women
home_illustration_3_text: do not have effective laws and practices to protect the privacy of online communications
data_non_publish: The data provider does not allow the Web Foundation to publish the information via this website. Please visit data source website for further information.
data_primary_indicators: This information is based on this year’s survey and the data are not available for previous years
data_tutorial_description: Welcome to the Web Index Data
data_tutorial_step_1: In this box you can select indicators. Please, select one indicator to continue.
data_tutorial_step_2: In this second box you could select data years. Please, select one year to continue.
data_tutorial_step_3: And in this box you could select up to 5 countries to compare, ALL countries or a region. Please, select one country to continue.
data_tutorial_step_4: In this tab you'll find the information related to the selected indicator. Click 'next' to continue
data_tutorial_step_5: And here you'll find the information related to the selected countries for the selected indicator
data_countries_reach: You have reached the selection limit
